description: Department of Natural Resources Canada needs assistance from contractor for development of standards and ISO processes.
full_summary:
### Advance Contract Award Notice: ISO/TC 301 Support Services

** Solicitation Number:** 5000068155
** Publication Date:** 9 December 2022
** Tender Closing Date:** 28 December 2022 (16:00 EST)

[Click here to download the tender documents](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/09/d75a61ec1109f78e5ff3fe328a3bebd8/acan_5000068155_en.pdf) (English)
[Click here to download the tender documents](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/09/6c2364074a28e876fb97f24cd91cdffe/acan_5000068155_fr.pdf) (French)

**Contract Description:**
The Government of Canada, through Natural Resources Canada (NRCan), has a requirement for services to support the development of standards and the ISO process. This procurement involves the provision of ISO services, specifically to support the Canadian Standard Mirror Committee (SMC) and its functions within the ISO 50001 standard.

**Key Services:**
- Providing ISO support services to NRCan, including maintaining linkages between the ISO Technical Committee 301 (TC 301) and the Canadian Standard Mirror Committee (SMC).
- Informing the SMC of any issues related to the ISO 50001 standard that may affect Canada.

**Eligibility and Bidding Instructions:**
This procurement is restricted to Canadian suppliers who have experience in providing ISO services. Interested suppliers must review the tender documents and information package to ensure they meet the requirements outlined.

**Contact Information:**
For more information, please contact:
- Moira Farkas, Contracting Authority
- Phone: 403-462-1162
- Email: [moira.farkas@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca](mailto:moira.farkas@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca)

### Important Notes:
This procurement was announced as part of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement.
